review:
Excellent doctor.
My Experience:
I am a chronic diabetic with fasting sugar 300+,and my sugar levels kept flucuating for almost 10 years. After I  consulted Dr.Bhavik Sanglani,Appollo sugar Clinic,Tardeo,my sugar levels are stable.It came to150. This doctor is very encouraging, excellent & polite with  patients unlike celebrity doctors with lesser patience, about the patients undergoing fears of diabetic complications etc & prescribing medicines having higher price factor.He has eliminated my fear of Diabetic complications.Thank you & may god bless you doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor listened to me very patiently and helped me calm down. he gave me advice to walk and how maintain my diet. My diabetes was never in control today it has calm down to a great extent and inorder to bring it to normal levels he has given me medicines. I found a good doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor Bhavik is a brilliant doctor, when i was struggling with medication for my mother super high diabities after having her operation, we met Dr. bhavik. Within few days he solved the problem to large extent. My mother likes to visit his clinic for his patience and polite approach to handle patient queries *** **** ********* *********.
Dr is Very good nexpains Very well.medicines also.staff is good news cooperative.i m happy coming here.dr gives  time as we r happy.

review: Good experience with doctor and staff of Apollo sugar clinic. Very nice sugar control in 1 month from Hba1c 12% to 9.6%.
Known personally. Very good Dr.  Staff is also good. Dr is cooperative and gives me time. N explaination is very  good.i m happy

Friendly and a good listener... Gives u adequate time to share ur health issues & particularly helps u out with a way u r satisfied with... always available on watsapp... Fully satisfied with his treatment...!
****** ** **** ************* *** prescribed medicine n test are good.depressed with foot problems but when coming there I was relaxed.and staff are very good n co-operative.

Experience with Doctor is good.
Will recommend  doctor to other patients. 
Over all experience with the team and doctor is good. 
Will follow  up timely

Experience was very good.
Will recommend other patient's too.
Experience overall was very good with the team.
Was referred by a pharma executive who is my relative

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Our million thanks to Dr.Bhavik, as the way he explained about the treatment and care to be taken was fantastic. My aunt is being treated by him and she is very happy and convinced that she is being treated by Dr. Bhavik. It is a boon for Chembur residents that we can get the best of treatment by Dr.Bhavik H Saglani at Apollo Hospital Chembur.

Dr. Bhavik is very very good. He understands our problems and listens to us patently and prescribes tablets n diet which is easy n practical to follow with our daily busy schedule. He really takes the trouble to understand all your concerns n problems . I really recommend him to all those who have high blood sugar problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: the Doctor's friendly attitude, patience to hear all that i wanted to say, *** ********* ***** *** ********* ********* ***** scientific approach and his ability to communicate and make you understand your situation-- these are the qualities which are truly wonderful.i found myself totally satisfied after my first visit.
Dr Bhavik is very approachable and good doctor.gives sufficient time to the patient and listens to our problems.I am very happy with his treatment at Apolllo sugar tardeo

I consulted Dr.Bhavik Saglani when I was diagnosed with Hypothyroid a few months ago. To my relief and due to his relentless support, my thyroid levels have been stable now. Dr.Bhavik is very responsive, super understanding and ever so helpful.
Doctor is really good, he is very helpful and supportive. He is always available for patient 24*7.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr Bhavik is a very good doctor after continuously following his treatment my sugar levels are very much under control. Explains everything very nicely.
Thank you so much help & good advice Dr Bhavik Saglani. Has been very professional fantastic service. I will recommend you to other people.
